import React from 'react'; import '../components/App/app.css'; import './weather.css'; export const MainWeather = (props) => { console.log(typeof props.data.icon); let newDate = new Date(); return (
{props.children}
{props.data.temp} C

feels like: {props.data.feels_like} C

wind: {props.data.wind.speed} м/c

humidity: {props.data.humidity}%

{/*

{props.data.temp_min} C

{props.data.temp_max} C

*/}

city: 

{props.data.city}

{newDate.getHours()}:{newDate.getMinutes()}:{newDate.getSeconds()}
{props.data.description}
{/*

Город:

{props.data.city}

*/}
); };
